gw.plugin.security

Interface AuthenticationSourceCreatorPlugin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface AuthenticationSourceCreatorPlugin
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    This plugin is responsible for creating an AuthenticationSource from an HTTPRequest object. The authentication source must be usable by the AuthenticationServicePlugin defined in the plugin config.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AuthenticationSource createSourceFromHTTPRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Creates an authentication source from a servlet request.

    • Method Detail

      • createSourceFromHTTPRequest

        AuthenticationSource createSourceFromHTTPRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                          throws InvalidAuthenticationSourceData
        Creates an authentication source from a servlet request.
        Parameters:
        request - The source request.
        Returns:
        An authentication source representing the data in the request.
        Throws:
        InvalidAuthenticationSourceData
